column4: I have a 5.04 DVD iso with a wrong md5. Is there a rsync server? (for re-downloading only the wrong parts)
dunno about rsync, but bittorrent can fix the file for you too
I think as long as the bytes aren't shifted over.. I think bittorrent just redownloads chunks, so if you somehow were missing the first byte it would still download the whole thing :-)
I'm using a dial-up link... I *can't* download 2 gb of data :-)
